Q: My spouse passed away; am I entitled to receive Social Security benefits?

A: Following a death, family members might be eligible to receive monthly Social Security benefits. You can report a death to the SSA using 1-800-772-1213. For more info go to http://www.ssa.gov/benefits/survivors. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EtFDTeBXYAAYv06.png

Q: How can I get a replacement Social Security card?

A: A new card is free and can be requested online by creating or accessing your “my Social Security account” at https://www.ssa.gov/myaccount. If you don’t have web access call the toll-free number at 1-800-772-1213. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EtFDKjCW8AEHxCI.png

Q: Can I work while collecting Social Security Retirement?  If so, how much can I earn?

A: Yes, you can work & collect Social Security Retirement at the same time. Use this online calculator to see how your earnings impacts your Social Security payment: https://www.ssa.gov/OACT/COLA/RTeffect.html http://pbs.twimg.com/media/EtFDDiVXMAAf98U.png
